name: Surgeon Simulator A&E + I Am Bread
name_original: Surgeon Simulator A&E + I Am Bread
description:
2 unique games linked by a shared universe and distinctive humour! Experience the epic saga of Bob from his humble beginnings in I am Bread, to ending up on the operating table in Surgeon Simulator.

The most critically acclaimed, one-handed, clumsy, bumbling, surgery simulation game on PS4™! Players use their controllers to operate one of Doctor Nigel Burke’s flailing arms, in an attempt to perform life-saving surgery on his peaceful and trusting patient, Bob.

‘I am Bread’ is the epic story of a slice of bread’s journey to become toast. Take the intrepid, crumby adventurer on a journey from his natural confines of the kitchen, through the home of an unsuspecting owner and into the outside world. This bread will be boldly going where no other bread has gone before . . .

Surgeon Simulator A&E:
1-2 players
1MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function
HD Video Output 720p
PlayStation®Camera Compatible

I am Bread:
1 player
850MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function
Remote Play Supported
HD Video Output 720p,1080p

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

Developed and published by Bossa Studios Ltd. Surgeon Simulator, I Am Bread, Bossa Studios and their respective logos and marks are trademarks of Bossa Studios Ltd.‎ All rights reserved. © 2015
